item.title: Handwave lends a hand to retailers with its European alternative to Amazon’s palm payments
item.description: Latvian startup Handwave aims to compete with Amazon palm payments by offering an independent alternative.

item.title: Female-founded semiconductor AI startup SixSense raises $8.5M
item.description: SixSense offers an AI-powered platform that helps chip makers prevent defects. It landed backing led by Peak XV’s Surge (formerly Sequoia India & SEA)...

item.title: Amazon CEO wants to put ads in your Alexa+ conversations

item.title: Apple projects tariff costs will hit $1.1B next quarter

item.title: Reddit revenue soars as it bets on AI and advertising
item.description: Reddit reported its Q2 earnings, and it’s clear that its focus on AI has ramped up significantly.
